articles.title: Why Siberia's Batagaika Crater Is Known as the Gateway to Hell | HowStuffWorks - HowStuffWorks
articles.description: It's known as the "Gateway to Hell" and while it might not actually get you there, what it will unleash if it keeps thawing could truly be hellish.
